body:
As most Americans know, today is the NFL's (American football) big game, featuring the New England Patriots and the Seattle Seahawks.
Who are you cheering for?
Seahawks all the way!
body_tagged:
As most Americans know, today is the NFL's (American football) big game, featuring the New England Patriots and the Seattle Seahawks.
Who are you cheering for?
Seahawks all the way!
title: Super Bowl Sunday: Who do you want to win?

replies.body:
Lol these are my two least favorite teams in the NFL, you can guess who my favorite team is:>

Therefore, I'm rooting for the penalties XD One flag = 2 points for the penalties, if penalties score more than the highest scoring team, than the penalties win.
